author: preston
msg: Fix to getRealPath() to strip the URI path associated with a Context from URI to be translated into a real path.
Without this the real path is always wrong for any non-root Context URI.

msg: extend a URI special handling case form webapps to all files.

author: costin
msg: - Fix bug 49 - config file can be relative to the WD.
- Tomcat no longer requires a cd to tomcat.home
- consistent treatement of directories - all are relative to
context manager home, as defined in server.xml.
- reviewd check for absolute path
- documentBase is no longer used in tomcat.core, it is still there for
bkwd compatibility ( will be removed in 3.2 )
